/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. In the center of the image, a body of water glistens under the sunlight, reflecting the city's vibrancy. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image exudes a sense of life and activity, characteristic of a thriving metropolis.
